Class TopViewHideShowAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.animation.Animation
      • android.view.animation.AnimationSet
        • com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.ui.animation.TopViewHideShowAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class TopViewHideShowAnimation
extends android.view.animation.AnimationSet
    An animation used to slide VideoControls in and out from the top of the screen when changing visibilities.
